bib.title: Gravitational birefringence and an exotic formula for redshifts
bib.author: Christian Duval and Johanna Pasquet and Thomas Schücker and Andre Tilquin
bib.abstract: We compute the birefringence of light in curved Robertson-Walker spacetimes and propose an exotic formula for redshift based on the internal structure of the spinning photon. We then use the Hubble diagram of supernovae to test this formula.
